page.title: 16LOCAL ACTIVITIES
page.content: Although Puddletown is quite a small place it has many clubs and activities to offer.The church runs some of these activities and villagers organise others. The activities are varied enough to cater for all age groups.For the young girls there are the majorettes who meet once a week and also take part in contests or give exhibitions nearly every Saturday.They have been going for about eight years. There are also the packs of cubs, brownies and guides.The local youth club provides table games and other activities.The church organises the Sunday club,the pathfinders and the Puddleuppers(for 14 to 18 age groups). For young and old alike there are regular meetings of the tap dancing and keep fit classes.There is also a Gardening Club for the less energetic.
